items.title: BIM MEP Modeling & Digital Fabrication
items.text: BIM MEP modeling for mechanical, electrical, plumbing, and fire protection systems. We develop LOD 300-400 models focused on coordination, prefabrication, and field execution.

items.title: Architectural & Structural BIM Modeling
items.text: Architectural and structural BIM modeling in collaborative environments. Precise, consistent models that support coordination, documentation, and constructability.

items.title: BIM Coordination
items.text: Interdisciplinary coordination via clash detection and constructability reviews. Model management, clash reports, and technical support throughout design and construction.

whyBascal.title: Why choose BasCal?
paragraphs: We are a specialized firm in architectural design, MEP engineering, and advanced BIM/VDC services. We develop high-precision models for complex projects, integrating architecture and technical networks into a single digital ecosystem.

With national and international experience, we support clients from preconstruction through occupancy. Our methodology delivers efficient solutions that reduce costs, risks, and rework at every project stage.
